enhanced_description: JoyfulPerson, also known as Joyform or Joyform.co, provides a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform designed for automating business communications. The core service allows customers to store, manipulate, analyze, and transfer messages between their internal business systems and their external customers across various JoyfulPerson-provided and third-party messaging channels. A key capability highlighted is the automation of WhatsApp for work, leveraging the WhatsApp Business API. Beyond customer-facing communications, JoyfulPerson also aims to improve employee happiness and engagement, indicating its application in HR-related communications for employee engagement, benefits, and development. The platform also offers features for accurate data collection and lead generation. JoyfulPerson targets Global and Large Enterprise customers.
